programme.title: Dionee
programme.desc: Paul, a young mechanic, falls in love with an orange-seller, Dionee, and decides to send her to the city and pay for her education. After some time Paul proposes to her but Dionee rejects him, deciding she can do better than an illiterate man.

programme.title: Imperfect Lady
programme.desc: As tension rises within her marriage because of their childlessness, Tosin falls back into the arms of her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Again
programme.desc: Willing to give their love another chance, Nifemi and Seun work towards repairing a damaged marriage that just may never recover

programme.title: Blurred
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A young couple decide to have an open marriage after being plagued by infidelity for a number of years; putting in place rules of engagement to make sure their relationship stays safe. Things get complicated when one of them falls in love with their new lover and seriously contemplates ending their marriage.

programme.title: The Fourth Party
programme.desc: Sophie Williams, the pregnant daughter of a billionaire chief, is on the verge of being duped and killed in exchange for all her inheritance after trusting the wrong people.

programme.title: Fashion Insider Season 1 - Denrele Edun
programme.desc: Discover new designers, trends, styles, and more at Fashion Insider. Elileojo Achebo provides you with the opportunity to gain firsthand knowledge of the African stylists of the moment.

programme.title: The Surrogate
programme.desc: In a desperate need to have a child, a young couple decide the go down to route of having a surrogate, a decision that threatens their family and almost destroys their marriage.

programme.title: Double Crossed
programme.desc: When Eric refuses to seek medical remedy for his sexual problems, Adanna discreetly satisfies her starved urge from a close family associate.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep 10
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her '6-Cardinal Rules'. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: Daybreak
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A typical heartbreaker and playboy wakes up to find out that his manhood has disappeared. He consults a prophet and finds out the curse has been put on him by one of the women he has angered and he has 24 hours to seek forgiveness from the one who has cursed him. The problem is, he doesn't know who the culprit is amongst all the women he has angered.

programme.title: The Governor's Daughter
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A high-flying woman, Mrs. Helen Onoja, is fixated on making sure her only son, Felix, not only marries from a class as high as hers, but specifically a governor’s daughter. She goes all out to arrange for him to date the spoilt daughter of her childhood friend, whose father happens to be the incumbent governor of Kogi State, ignoring the fact that Felix is in love with another woman, Abike. Meanwhile Felix’s relationship with Abike suffers because he is unable to stand up to his domineering mother.

programme.title: Lama
programme.desc: When a doctor meets a patient with mysterious injuries, he suspects she is a victim of domestic abuse and asks the police to investigate putting her in even more danger.

programme.title: Lurk
programme.desc: A woman dedicated to her work is unaware that she has made enemies who would stop at nothing to see her dead.

programme.title: Satisfy Me
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Satisfy Me follows the life of a lady in her late thirties who wants to settle down by any means, which leads her into marrying a man with narcissistic personality disorder. She loses herself trying to boost his ego, not realising he is mentally unstable until it becomes too late.
